attributes.action: Limit the pay of all public servants to below that of the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No person who is paid from public funds for any job whatsoever shall be paid more than the PM.
Bonuses, perks, expenses, pensions included; Quangos, Civil servants, BBC (excluding entertainers with a £750k pa cap for them) Local Authorities, Legislators and Judges.
Everybody!
